declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @vchFullSQL varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: View [dbo].[vw_ConsolidationSecurityLoanDetails] Script Date: 18/09/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[vw_ConsolidationSecurityLoanDetails]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vw_ConsolidationSecurityLoanDetails] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL = ' --Security view
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_ConsolidationSecurityLoanDetails] AS SELECT FS.DimPoolID as [Pool Cut ID] ,dt.TrustID as [Trust] ,FC.ConsolidationNo as [Consolidation No] ,FC.LTVPassNo as [Loan To Value Ratio Pass No] ,FS.SecurityNo as [Security No] ,FL.AccountNo as [Loan Account No] , case when ISNULL(FLS.DimLoanID,0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as [Security Loan Direct Linkage] ,FC.SecurityCount as [Consolidation Security Count] ,FC.LoanCount as [Consolidation Loan Count] ,DS.OrganisationCode as [Organisation] --, dsfl.ReportingDateID as [Reporting Date] , DS.SecurityAdr1 as [Security Address1] , DS.SecurityAdr2 as [Security Address2] , DS.SecurityAdr3 as [Security Address3] , DS.SecurityAdr4 as [Security Address4] , DS.SecurityAdr5 as [Security Address5] , DS.Tenure as [Tenure Code] , DS.PropertyTypeCode as [Property Type] , DS.PropertyTypeDesc as [Property Type Description] , DS.Suburb as [Security Suburb] , DS.PostCode as [Security Properties post code] , DS.State as [Security State] , DS.Region as [Security Region] , DS.CountryCode as [Security Country Code] , FS.SecurityValuationAmt as [Security Property Valuation Amount] , FS.SecurityValuationDate as [Valuation Date] , DS.Nature as [Security Nature] , DS.Type as [Security Type] , FLS.DebtChargePosition as [Loan Security Debt Charge Position] , cast(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance as decimal(15, 4)) * cast(FC.ConsolidationLTV as decimal(15, 4)) as [Weighted Consolidation LTV] , cast(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance as decimal(15, 4)) * cast(FC.ConsolidationLimitLTV as decimal(15, 4)) as [Weighted Consolidation Limit LTV] , cast(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance as decimal(15, 4)) * cast(FC.ConsolidationSeasoning as decimal(15, 4)) as [Weighted Seasoning] , ISNULL(FLS.DebtChargePosition,''''NULL'''') as [Debt Charge Position] , FCS.SecurityRank as [SecurityRankingSequence] , FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance as [Current Principal Balance] , FL.CurrentBalanceDistributionCode as [Current Balance Distribution Code] , FL.Seasoning as [Seasoning] , FL.SeasoningDistributionCode as [Seasoning Distribution Code] , FL.CurrentRate as [Current Rate] , FL.CurrentRateDistributionCode as [Current Rate Distribution] , FL.DaysInArrears as [Days in Arrears] , FL.DaysInArrearsDistributionCode as [Days In Arrears Distribution] , FL.InterestOnlyRemainingTerm as [EC_06_02 Remaining Interest Only Term] , FL.DimInterestOnlyRemainingTermDistributionCode as [EC_06_02 Interest Only Remaining Term Distribution] , cast(FC.ConsolidationBalance as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation Balance] , cast(FC.ConsolidationLimitBalance as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation Limit Balance] , cast(FC.ConsolidationOriginalBalance as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation Original Balance] , cast(FC.ConsolidationLTV as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation LTV] , dbo.fn_GetDistributionCode(FC.DimConsolidationLTVDistributionID, ''''CurrentLoanToValueRatio'''') as [Consolidation LTV Distribution] , cast(FC.ConsolidationLimitLTV as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation Limit LTV] , dbo.fn_GetDistributionCode(FC.DimConsolidationLimitLTVDistributionID, ''''Current Limit Loan To Value Ratio'''') as [Consolidation LimitLTV Distribution] , cast(FC.ConsolidationSeasoning as decimal(15, 4)) as [Consolidation Seasoning] From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC (nolock) JOIN dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS (nolock) ON FC.DimPoolId=FCS.DimPoolId And FC.DimConsolidationId=FCS.DimConsolidationId And FC.LTVPassNo=FCS.LTVPassNo JOIN dbo.tblFactSecurity FS (nolock) ON FS.DimSecurityId=FCS.DimSecurityId And FS.DimPoolId=FCS.DimPoolId JOIN dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL (nolock) ON FCL.DimPoolId=FC.DimPoolId And FCL.DimConsolidationId=FC.DimConsolidationId And FCL.LTVPassNo=FC.LTVPassNo JOIN dbo.tblFactLoan FL (nolock) ON FL.DimLoanId=FCL.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolId=FCL.DimPoolId LEFT JOIN dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity FLS (nolock) ON FLS.DimSecurityId = FS.DimSecurityId And FLS.DimPoolId=FS.DimPoolId And FLS.DimLoanId=FL.DimLoanId JOIN dbo.tblDimSecurity DS (nolock) ON FS.DimSecurityId=DS.DimSecurityId And FS.DimPoolId=DS.DimPoolId JOIN dbo.view_DimTrust dt on fl.DimTrustID = dt.DimTrustID ' SET @vchFullSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @vchFullSQL EXEC (@vchFullSQL)
